title: .copyWithin()
description: The `.copyWithin()` JS method copies part of an array from a start index to an end index (not included) to another location within the same array, modifying the original array.
content: The method that copies part of an array from the start index to the end index (not included) and pastes it into a specified position within the same array. It overwrites existing elements in place without adding or removing items.
